subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
McCain insists 'signs of progress' in Iraq

04/09/07 08:50 PM, EDT
A day after the broadcast of an interview in which he admitted overstating security advances in Baghdad, U.S. Sen. John McCain said Monday that he still believes the Iraq war is winnable and "unfortunately, the American people are not being told of the progress that's being made" there.
FULL STORY
